summary: *The Fault in Our Stars* is a heartwarming movie about two teenagers, Hazel (Shailene Woodley) and Gus (Ansel Elgort), who meet at a cancer support group. Despite their illness, they fall in love and embark on a journey to Amsterdam. The film is based on John Green's novel and became a critical and commercial success. It made a lot of money and received praise for its emotional storytelling and the actors' performances. The story shows how these young people navigate life, love, and their shared experience with cancer.
title: The Fault in Our Stars (film)
